metadata.title: CVE-2023-40074 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In saveToXml of PersistableBundle.java, invalid data could lead to localpersistent denial of service with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
